Detailed Description

Task with variable number parameters to signal a victim that results have been produced. The signalization is either local or remote. Such task is not stealable onto a remote address space. The number of parameters is equal to the number of parameters of the stolen closure. _mode_stolen_clo[i] is the access mode of the i-th parameter of the stolen closure. This DOES NOT include the pass by value parameter (AccessMode::v). _a is the array of access (at most _nparam accesses).
